samosa.title: Samosa
samosa.Description: Samosa is a popular Indian snack made of crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes minced meat. It's deep-fried to perfection.

steps.step1: Boil and mash potatoes, mix with peas and spices.
steps.step2: Fill the pastry with the potato mixture, fold into a triangle.

pakora.title: Pakora
pakora.Description: Pakora is a deep-fried snack made from chickpea flour batter mixed with various vegetables like onions, spinach, or potatoes.

steps.step2: Dip them in chickpea flour batter mixed with spices.

vada.title: Vada
vada.Description: Vada is a South Indian snack made of deep-fried, spiced lentil doughnut-shaped fritters.

steps.step1: Soak urad dal, grind into a thick batter with spices.
steps.step2: Shape into doughnuts and deep fry.

bhel_puri.title: Bhel Puri
bhel_puri.Description: Bhel Puri is a popular Indian street food snack made from puffed rice, vegetables, chutneys, and spices.

steps.step1: Mix puffed rice with chopped vegetables.
steps.step2: Add chutneys and spices, toss well and serve.

aloo_tikki.title: Aloo Tikki
aloo_tikki.Description: Aloo Tikki is a North Indian snack made from mashed potatoes mixed with spices, shaped into patties, and shallow-fried.

steps.step1: Mix mashed potatoes with spices, shape into patties.

paneer_tikka.title: Paneer Tikka
paneer_tikka.Description: Paneer Tikka is a popular Indian appetizer made from marinated paneer (cottage cheese) and vegetables, skewered and grilled.

steps.step1: Marinate paneer and vegetables, thread them onto skewers.

dhokla.title: Dhokla
dhokla.Description: Dhokla is a savory steamed cake made from fermented rice and chickpea flour, often served with chutneys.

steps.step1: Prepare batter, ferment, and steam until done.
steps.step2: Cut into pieces and serve with chutneys.

pani_puri.title: Pani Puri
pani_puri.Description: Pani Puri is a popular Indian street food snack consisting of hollow, crispy shells filled with spicy tangy water and potato stuffing.

steps.step1: Fill puri shells with potato stuffing.
steps.step2: Dip in spicy tangy water and serve immediately.

dosa.title: Dosa
dosa.Description: Dosa is a South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and urad dal (lentils) batter, typically served with chutney and sambar.

steps.step1: Spread dosa batter on a hot griddle, cook until crispy.

jalebi.title: Jalebi
jalebi.Description: Jalebi is a sweet Indian dessert made from deep-fried, coiled batter soaked in sugar syrup.

steps.step1: Make batter, deep-fry in coiled shapes.
steps.step2: Soak in sugar syrup, garnish with saffron strands.
